column2: "I could try to do it myself, but what fun would that be? I mean, we all know how that would turn out."
"So you're saying I should let you by here and just hold in all my rage?! How could I? How?"
"I know you're the better choice for the job, plus you can get some major stress relief by smacking down those annoying little critters!"
"I'm counting on you! I'll be checking the whole thing out on the monitor, and with a big ol' smile on my face! Go get 'em!"
